price: 17. Waxaa lagu odhan: Waxakanu waa waxaad beenin jirteen.
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
